00013 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00014 template<class T> class Array;
00015 template<class K, class V, class H> class Dictionary;
00016 class String;
00017 class Object;
00018 class SerializedObject;
00019 class _serkey;
00020 
00021 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00022 class Deserializer : public Object {
00023 public:
00024 
00025     Deserializer() {
00026     }
00027     virtual ~Deserializer();
00028 
00029     template<class T>
00030     virtual Deserializer & operator>>(const T * t) = 0;
00031     template<>
00032     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <unsigned int>(const unsigned int * i) = 0;
00033     template<>
00034     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <int>(const int * i) = 0;
00035     template<>
00036     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <unsigned long>(const unsigned long * l) = 0;
00037     template<>
00038     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <long>(const long * l) = 0;
00039     template<>
00040     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <float>(const float * f) = 0;
00041     template<>
00042     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <double>(const double * d) = 0;
00043     template<>
00044     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <bool>(const bool * b) = 0;
00045     template<class T>
00046     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <Array<T> >(const Array<T> * ar) = 0;
00047     template<>
00048     virtual Deserializer & operator>>(const String * s) = 0;
00049     template<class K, class H, class V>
00050     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <Dictionary<K,H,V> >
00051         (const Dictionary<K, H, V> * dict) = 0;
00052     virtual Deserializer & operator>>(const _serkey & key) = 0;
00053 
00054     template<>
00055     virtual Deserializer & operator>> <SerializedObject>
00056         (const SerializedObject * obj) = 0;
00057 
00058 };
